Description: Roundel of tapestry, applied and sewn to plain weave, undyed linen; tapestry is damaged with only a few woollen threads remaining, decoration is hard to identify; in the centre is a human figure, standing?, with a crown?; plain weave: warp-undyed linen (S/14), weft-undyed linen (S/17); on the reverse are sewing threads in running stitches and oversewing in undyed linen (S spun Z ply); tapestry on grouped threads: warp-undyed linen (S spun Z ply/12), weft-undyed linen (S), red and green wool (S); oversewing in undyed linen (S spun Z ply)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
